m_szDocSumamry: BMW iNext Strategy To Focus On Autonomous Driving, Connectivity, Electrification Originally published on EV Obsession . BMW has unveiled a new strategy, dubbed iNext, that calls for the company to focus on automated driving, digital connectivity, electrification, and lightweight construction, among other things, according to recent reports.
